name: typestripped
description: Tiny, dependency-free library that transpiles (most) TypeScript to JavaScript in the browser.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist dist-min ; tsc --target es2020 --declaration --sourceMap --outDir dist src/*.ts && mkdir -p dist-min && for f in dist/*.js; do terser --module --mangle module --keep-fnames --source-map -o dist-min/$(basename $f) -- $f; done && cp dist/*.d.ts dist-min
scripts.test: for a in tests/*.ts ; do echo $a ; ./bin/cli.js "$a" --recover --output /dev/stdout 2> /dev/null | diff -u "${a%.ts}.js" - || exit 1 ; done && echo OK
scripts.prepack: npm run build && npm run test

author: Frank van Viegen
